description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Relations des quatre voyages entrepris par C. Colomb pour la découverte du Nouveau-Monde de 1492 à 1504; suivies de diverses lettres et pièces inédites. ... Ouvrage traduit de l'Espagnol par MM. F. T. A. Chalumeau de Verneuil ... et de La Roquette ... accompagné de notes des traducteurs et de MM. A. Rémusat, A. Balbi, etc" Author: FERNANDEZ DE NAVARRETE, Martin. Contributor: BALBI, Adriano. Contributor: CHALUMEAU DE VERNEUIL, F. T. Alphonse. Contributor: DEZOS DE LA ROQUETTE, Jean Baptiste Marie Alexandre. Contributor: RÉMUSAT, Jean Pierre Abel. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10026.f.4.", "British Library HMNTS G.2767-9." Volume: 02 Page: 8 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1828 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001220642 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
